abstract.para: This section lists the known issues with the &owui; and their solutions.

section.title: User password reset
section.para: An &owui; user can only reset their own password if they are logged in to &owui; and have an active Web browser session. However, if the user has lost their password and cannot log in to &owui;, the password must be reset by an &rke2; administrator using the kubectl command.

step.para: Generate a new password hash using the htpasswd command. htpasswd is part of the apache2-utils package.
Identify the Pod where the &owui; application is running.

section.title: Audio processing stops after several minutes
section.para: When the voice recorder is used as described in , &owui; tries to process the audio, but it times out without any warning and no text is generated. The API endpoint /audio/api/v1/transcriptions, which receives the audio to be processed, results in a 504 Gateway Timeout.
